headline: Boeing’s Strong January Orders Confront Labor Strains And Defense Demands
summary: Boeing (NYSE:BA) reports one of its strongest Januarys for aircraft orders and deliveries. The company outpaces Airbus in both new orders and deliveries for the month. Boeing secures a major U.S. Air Force contract to upgrade the C-17A transport aircraft fleet. Union groups raise concerns about job relocations to South Carolina and potential layoffs. Boeing sits at the center of global commercial aviation and U.S. defense programs, so its monthly order and delivery figures are closely...
